means: 官僚的，官僚主义的，官僚作风的

sentence.Network_en: They have decentralised the company and made it less bureaucratic.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们已经分解了该公司的权力，以抑制其官僚作风。

sentence.Network_en: Democracy is incompatible with excessive, bureaucratic regimentation of social life.
sentence.Network_cn: 受到过度的、官僚化的管制的社会生活中不存在民主。

sentence.Network_en: The department has become a bureaucratic nightmare.
sentence.Network_cn: 该部门的官僚作风非常严重。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2013年高考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... burden n. （义务，责任的） 重担，负担 bureaucratic a. 官僚的 burglar n. 入室窃贼.
高中英语3500词汇电子书版 - 豆丁网 ... burden 负担，担子 bureaucratic 官僚主义的 burglar 夜盗，窃贼.
新东方高考英语核心词汇精选2000 - 豆丁网 ... burden 担子，重担；装载量 bureaucratic 官僚政治的 burglar 夜盗.
综合英语二上册词汇表02 - 豆丁网 ... bureaucracy n. 官僚政治，官僚主义 bureaucratic a. 官僚的，繁文缛节的 cargo n. 货物.

list.abs: 我国学校组织的基本架构为科层体制（bureaucratic system ），科层体制具有权威阶层、法规条例、专职分工、不讲人倩、书面案卷 …
官僚控制（Bureaucratic Control）氏族控制（Clan Control） 研究活动 [编辑] 在更大的社区，大内供职于美国总统辩论委员会的咨询 …
行政管理专... ... bureaucratic model 官僚模式 bureaucratic organization 官僚组织 Bureaucratic sabotage 官僚怠工/官僚破坏.

entry.def: Bureaucratic means involving complicated rules and procedures which can cause long delays.

example.ex: Diplomats believe that bureaucratic delays are inevitable...
example.tran: 外交官们认为繁文缛节造成的延迟是在所难免的。

example.ex: The department has become a bureaucratic nightmare.
example.tran: 该部门的官僚作风非常严重。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or resembling a bureaucrat or bureaucracy;

auth_sentence.content: Bribes can be a way of short-cutting bureaucratic hurdles.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bribes can be a way of short-cutting bureaucratic hurdles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bribes can be a way of short-cutting bureaucratic hurdles.

auth_sentence.content: Bureaucratic resistance stymied Cheney and Rumsfeld on several fronts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bureaucratic resistance stymied Cheney and Rumsfeld on several fronts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bureaucratic resistance stymied Cheney and Rumsfeld on several fronts.

auth_sentence.content: In bureaucratic terms, she was Confidential Informant No.
auth_sentence.res_content: In bureaucratic terms, she was Confidential Informant No.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In bureaucratic terms, she was Confidential Informant No.

means.word_mean: 官僚的, 官僚主义的, 官僚作风的

sentences.en: In this company you have to go through complex bureaucratic procedures just to get a new pencil.
sentences.cn: 在这个公司里即使是领一支新铅笔, 也必须通过繁琐的手续。

jushi.english: In this company you have to go through complex bureaucratic procedures just to get a new pencil.
jushi.chinese: 在这个公司里即使是领一支新铅笔，也必须通过繁琐的手续。
